caption.title: Confirmed ZIKV-linked microcephaly cases in Brazilian states versus per capita GDP (in log10 US Dollars).
caption.p: The number of confirmed ZIKV-linked microcephaly cases per 100,000 people (as of July 15, 2016) is negatively correlated (Pearsonâ€™s correlation coefficient r = -0.64) with per capita GDP for states with one or more cases. Total GDP data were retrieved from the 2012 IBGE report ( http://www.ibge.gov.br/english/estatistica/economia/contasregionais/2012/default.shtm; accessed July 7, 2016). Population sizes by state were retrieved from the 2014 IBGE report. Per capita GDP = Total GDP/population size. Microcephaly data are from weekly epidemiological reports from PAHO, as compiled by the CDC EPI.
